meanings.definition: A verb form ending in -ing that functions as a noun.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy swimming in the pool.
meanings.sent3: Eating ice cream makes me happy.

meanings.definition: A gerund phrase is a phrase consisting of a gerund and any modifiers or complements it may have.
meanings.sent1: Her painting the beautiful landscape impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: I love reading books in my free time.
meanings.sent3: His cooking skills saved the dinner party.
meanings.sent4: The student's studying late into the night paid off.
meanings.sent5: Their laughing at the joke echoed in the room.
